comments.text:
"não pode aparecer uma mulher que o povo acha qualquer coisa pra criticar." 
Nunca critiquei nenhuma mulher nesse quadro, sendo que acompanho os 
Barbixas desde antes dos improváveis. Mas o jeito dessa Mc não agradou 
muito, provavelmente por ela ter começado há pouco tempo, não por ser 
mulher. Você está enxergando sexismo onde não existe. E dizer que nenhuma 
mulher antes foi bem recebida é ser completamente hipócrita, no segundo 
episódio do quadro "Trilha Sonora", por exemplo, só tiveram elogios quanto 
à participação da Bella Marcatti.

captions.text:
In this game, you will see
a series of short scenes,

where Daniel Tauszig will improvise
some music to inspire the players.

In the middle of the
scene, I'll ring the bell,

pick up one of the sentences you
wrote before entering the theater,
that sentence will be the title of the scene.

After I ring the bell, no one
else can join the scene. Okay?

It's on a loop! It's a
recording, we've been fooled!

It's not a recording!
Who are you?

It's just some guy who's here to
interfere with the investigation!

- He's good!
- The title is: 'I'm the sugar cane fairy'.

- Are you Luis Pereira Andrade Augusto?
- Wait!

- Was that you, or the dispatcher?
- I don't know anymore!

Dispatch, I thought it was the
sugar cane fairy, but it isn't!

- This photo...
- Looks a lot like you, right?

- Yes! I could say that's me!
- Yes, but this photo is from 1649!

- That's way more scarier!
- Extremely scarier! Don't you see?

Your grandfather travelled to the past
and invented the photographic camera!

We have to get in the time machine
and prevent this from happening!

'If you want to talk about
love, talk to Marcinho'.

My grandson!
You're my grandson, right?

Drop it!
I know what this is!

You just invented the
photographic camera!

- Oh, yes!
- Throw it to the ground!

- I will never do that!
- Break it, you don't know who...

More...
Get closer to each other...
What a wind coming from my window...
I wonder when we will meet again.
I'm sending some wind for you.

If you're feeling this wind,
it means I'm there with you.
There's a drizzle in this wind!

And the title is:
'Next stop, Sé station'.

It's coming...
Summer is coming to a stop.

Spring is coming to a stop... Autumn is
coming to a stop... Winter is coming to a stop!
And the next stop is the Sé station!

- My dar... - And the title is:
'I'm like this because I use botox'.

My darling, you're a very sexy girl, but
I asked for Luci, the capoeira player!
I'll show you what I did to my face!

WATCH POLITICAL CAMPAIGN
RICARDO REIS / ÁLVARO CAMPOS

WATCH MORE IMPROVÁVEL
WITH CAROL / WITH JOSÉ / TITLE IN THE MIDDLE

WATCH MORE
SKETCHES 1ST SEASON / EM BREVES
